arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappe beats Brazilian Ronaldo's Real Madrid record with quickfire brace in 2-1 win over Villarreal - as he recreates Cristiano Ronaldo's iconic celebration
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappe smashed a goalscoring record of Real Madrid icon Ronaldo Nazario with a vital quickfire brace against Villarreal - and marked it by recreating Cristiano Ronaldo's celebration.

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappé vs Robert Lewandowski: Pichichi race latest after Real Madrid star’s brace vs Villarreal

arts.ttl: Mbappé scores twice to give Real Madrid 2-1 win against Villarreal in La Liga
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappé scored twice to lead Real Madrid to a 2-1 comeback win at Villarreal and move three points clear atop the Spanish league on Saturday. Barcelona is three points behind Madrid but has played two games less.

arts.ttl: Villarreal 1-2 Real Madrid: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Kylian Mbappe brace fires Los Blancos to La Liga summit
arts.sum: Real Madrid move to the top of the La Liga table courtesy of a 2-1 victory over Villarreal, with Kylian Mbappe hitting a brace for the capital giants.

arts.ttl: ‘He’s back’ – Real Madrid star comes in for widespread praise for performance vs Villarreal

arts.ttl: Villarreal 1–2 Real Madrid: Player Ratings As Kylian Mbappe's Brace Inspires Comeback Victory
arts.sum: Two goals from Kylian Mbappé secured Real Madrid's 1–2 victory against Villarreal.

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappé breaks Ronaldo record with Real Madrid goals vs Villarreal
